imdb.plot outline: The idea of Brain's Trust was inspired by President Roosevelt's selection of two professors from Columbia University to advice him on matters of importance without biases and rhetoric, rooted in facts and insights. A New York Times reporter discovered this and all the thinkers and scholars who formed a part of this knowledge confederacy were a part of the President's Brain's Trust. For Brain's Trust India we are creating a confederacy of great minds who will be part of this series. The British High Commission is a partner in this project and there will also be speakers of eminence from the UK who will participate in this program.
imdb.title: Brains Trust
plot: The idea of Brain's Trust was inspired by President Roosevelt's selection of two professors from Columbia University to advice him on matters of importance without biases and rhetoric, rooted in facts and insights. A New York Times reporter discovered this and all the thinkers and scholars who formed a part of this knowledge confederacy were a part of the President's Brain's Trust. For Brain's Trust India we are creating a confederacy of great minds who will be part of this series. The British High Commission is a partner in this project and there will also be speakers of eminence from the UK who will participate in this program.
